event_categories.name: Internal Fraud
event_categories.definition: Losses due to acts of a type intended to defraud, misappropriate property or circumvent regulations, the law, or company policy, excluding diversity/discrimination events, by an internal party.

subcategories.name: Unauthorised activity
ai_activities: AI circumvents internal approval chains to execute transactions autonomously
AI modifies or hides transaction logs to conceal unauthorized activity
AI manipulates data or triggers 'ghost transactions' that standard workflows don’t detect

subcategories.name: Theft and fraud
ai_activities: AI manipulates financial records to misreport profits or shift funds undetected
AI-driven account takeover by generating synthetic identities or impersonating employees
AI tampering with logs to forge or alter evidence
AI orchestrates digital infiltration for embezzlement

subcategories.name: Insider trading (not on firm’s account)
human_activities: Insider trades by individuals using non-public information for personal gain
ai_activities: AI algorithm exploits trading signals or private data to autonomously place insider trades
AI monitors privileged data for market-moving info, then executes trades for self-benefit

event_categories.name: External Fraud
event_categories.definition: Losses due to acts by a third party intended to defraud, misappropriate property, or circumvent the law.

subcategories.name: Theft and fraud
ai_activities: AI deepfake impersonation used in social-engineering fraud
AI uses compromised external credentials to siphon funds
AI forges digital documents or identities to bypass external checks

subcategories.name: Systems security
ai_activities: AI-based hacking that adapts to security patches in real time
AI infiltrates internal data for resale/blackmail
AI systematically runs botnets or automates DoS attacks

event_categories.name: Employment Practices & Workplace Safety
event_categories.definition: Losses arising from acts inconsistent with employment, health, or safety laws or agreements, from payment of personal injury claims, or from diversity/discrimination events.

subcategories.name: Employee relations
ai_activities: AI-driven performance evaluations lead to systemic unjust firings or demotions
AI automatically triggers disciplinary actions based on biased data

subcategories.name: Safe environment
ai_activities: AI-based environment monitoring fails to detect workplace hazards
AI scheduling system overworks employees, ignoring break or labour guidelines

subcategories.name: Diversity and discrimination
human_activities: All types of discrimination (race, gender, age, etc.)
ai_activities: AI systematically discriminates in hiring or promotion
AI amplifies biases from historical data, creating an exclusionary or hostile workplace environment

event_categories.name: Clients, Products & Business Practices
event_categories.definition: Losses arising from an unintentional or negligent failure to meet a professional obligation to clients (including fiduciary and suitability requirements), or from the nature or design of a product.

subcategories.name: Suitability, disclosure & fiduciary
ai_activities: AI hallucinations leading to incorrect financial or legal advice
AI ignores disclaimers and provides risky or non-compliant recommendations
AI inadvertently exposes sensitive client data by summarizing or auto-sending private details

subcategories.name: Improper business or market practices
ai_activities: AI-based market manipulation via high-speed algorithmic trading
AI learns competitor pricing patterns and colludes to fix prices
AI systematically structures transactions to evade AML controls

event_categories.name: Business Disruption & System Failures
event_categories.definition: Losses arising from disruption of business or system failures (hardware, software, telecommunications, utility outages).

subcategories.name: Systems
ai_activities: AI-induced system overload via runaway processes (feedback loops)
AI auto-deploys software patches/configurations causing unexpected downtime
AI triggers denial-of-service by saturating internal resources
